Failure in Basic Windows tests `cmake/build/Debug/dns_resolver_cooldown_test.exe`:

https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/9e4349b3-78f4-4724-a391-d0527c0046cf/targets/github%2Fgrpc%2Fc_windows_dbg_native/tests
```
D0423 14:41:09.086000000  3284 test_config.cc:391] test slowdown factor: sanitizer=1, fixture=1, poller=1, total=1
D0423 14:41:09.086000000  3284 dns_resolver.cc:330] Using native dns resolver
D0423 14:41:09.086000000  3284 dns_resolver_cooldown_test.cc:242] test: 'dns:127.0.0.1' should be valid for 'dns'
D0423 14:41:09.102000000  2732 dns_resolver.cc:248] In cooldown from last resolution (from 7 ms ago). Will resolve again in 993 ms
```

I will take a look at the test failure tomorrow.

@mehrdada after this is merged, let's backport to v1.11.x  and release v1.11.1 (along with the two other resolver fixes that have been backported before).

Also, let's merge this before cutting the v1.12.x branch.

@AspirinSJL  looks like all the test failures are the same issue
```
I0426 00:04:49.759711728    3472 dns_resolver_cooldown_test.cc:220] 1st: g_on_resolution_invocations_count: 1, g_resolution_count: 1
I0426 00:04:49.759735022    3472 dns_resolver_cooldown_test.cc:188] 2nd: g_on_resolution_invocations_count: 2, g_resolution_count: 1
I0426 00:04:49.759741733    3472 dns_resolver_cooldown_test.cc:163] 3rd: g_on_resolution_invocations_count: 3, g_resolution_count: 1
E0426 00:04:49.759745681    3472 dns_resolver_cooldown_test.cc:170] assertion failed: g_resolution_count == 2
```
Please target this at 1.11.x branch so we can easily upmerge.
